events.name: Make 'n' Speak Hackathon
events.description: In this unique camp, co-organized by Science Centre and The Kidz Parade magazine, children (10-12 years) learn to propose and build solutions for a sustainable life and learn how learn how technologies can be used to develop smart solutions. Children also learn to communicate about their projects, participate in discussions and write about their work for a chance to get published! This is a day camp, 10am-4pm. Lunch will be provided

events.name: Front End TL;DR March 2015
events.description: Let's visit migme, a startup that has been around forever and is currently reinventing itself as a social entertainment destination, complete with IPO and fresh funding from Foxconn last year. Come to learn about the host company but more importantly to learn front end tech technology. FEDS aims to showcase startups doing cool front end work, but also to sharpen our skills. We will split up into small teams, pick a topic of interest (e.g. library, framework, tool) and collaborate on it for an hour or so. Then present our findings for the common good, and the most interesting team wins a fabulous prize! Schedule: Every third Monday of the month. Different venue each time. 7:00pm — Arrival, registration, seating 7:10pm — Intro talk 7:30pm — Teams work on mini challenges 8:30pm — Presentations, awards 9:00pm — The end. More info: http://feds.strikingly.com/ PS: Bring a laptop and show up a bit earlier to get set up on the wifi.

events.name: Smart Living API Night - Smart Nation API coLAB
events.description:
At this API Night, you can dive into APIs in telco, health and fitness, entertainment and personal gadgets and learn from API owners about how to use their APIs. You will also get to network with partners and fellow like-minded participants to start thinking forming a team for the Hack Day.  
  
As part of the Smart Nation API coLAB , we'll be putting together partners in the "API Economy" and lots of public and private sector API owners, we'll be exploring how APIs can help unlock business value and play a key role in spurring new innovation. This is the perfect opportunity for you to absorb all things 'API'. 
  
Also join us at the API LAB for the kick-off, Intel Mashery API Masterclass and themed API Nights (Transport, Travel & Places, and Fintech & Commerce). The whole week culminates in a spectacular Hack Day where you can experiement with over 100 APIs and wow us with their hacks during the show-and-tell.  
  
Themed API Night Programme  
7.00pm - Welcome from Lead Partners 
7.20pm - Partners speak about their APIs, followed by Q&A 
9.00pm - Networking  
More Information 
To find out more about the coLAB visit: http://www.upsingapore.com/smart-nation-api-colab. Got any questions? Want to know how you can share your API at the coLAB? Drop us an email.
